dict.string: WeekGrid uses your location to show weather forecasts alongside your calendar events, helping you plan your week better.
WeekGrid can show weather forecasts for your calendar days to help you plan activities.
WeekGrid needs access to your contacts to import and sync contact information for easy management within the app.
WeekGrid uses the camera to scan QR codes for quickly importing contact information.
WeekGrid uses photos for contact profile pictures, letting you personalize your contacts with custom images.
WeekGrid shows your calendar events alongside the weekly view, helping you see your schedule at a glance.
